mapper.insert: INSERT INTO app_user_login_his ( id , access_client , user_id , nick_name , login_date , init_logon_time , last_logon_time , logon_times , app_version , android_version , android_client ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{accessClient} , #{userId} , #{nickName} , #{loginDate} , #{initLogonTime} , #{lastLogonTime} , #{logonTimes} , #{appVersion} , #{androidVersion} , #{androidClient} )
